players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Investigation results confirmed. Stay cautious, Alice."
Charlie: "I'm keeping an eye on everyone. Stay alert."
You: "Bob, keep your suspicions high. I'll watch over Charlie."
You: "Bob, continue vigilance. Charlie's trustworthy, watch others closely."
Bob: "Staying sharp, Alice. Keep an eye on Diana & Charlie."
Charlie: "Observing all, stay vigilant. Trust but verify."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.

Day 1 begins.
You: "Investigation results confirmed. Stay cautious, Alice."
Charlie: "I'm keeping an eye on everyone. Stay alert."
Alice: "Bob, keep your suspicions high. I'll watch over Charlie."
Alice: "Bob, continue vigilance. Charlie's trustworthy, watch others closely."
You: "Staying sharp, Alice. Keep an eye on Diana & Charlie."
Charlie: "Observing all, stay vigilant. Trust but verify."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
